section.heading: Classes of personal property -- Rulemaking authority.

content.p: 59-2-107. Classes of personal property -- Rulemaking authority. The commission shall make rules: (1) in accordance with Title 63G, Chapter 3, Utah Administrative Rulemaking Act ; (2) defining classes of items considered to be personal property for purposes of this chapter; (3) defining items that fall into the classes established under Subsection (2) ; and (4) defining any class or item as personal property if the commission defined that class or item as personal property prior to January 1, 2004, by: (a) a rule made in accordance with Title 63G, Chapter 3, Utah Administrative Rulemaking Act ; (b) a published decision of the commission; or (c) an official schedule published by the commission.
